DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of the Gatekeeper System in the treatment of patients with Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD) who already have been treated under study protocols Endo 2000-03 and Endo 2000-04
DOC.criteria: Subjects must have been part of the Endo 200003 or Endo 200004 clinical study Subjects who have been informed of the nature of the longterm followup study and have agreed to its participation and provided Informed Consent Underwent another endoscopic or surgical treatment for GERD (except reintervention with Gatekeeper) Developed other medical illness that may cause the subject to be noncompliant Extensive Barrett's Esophagus (>2 cm) Unable or unwilling to cooperate with the study procedures
